codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats17Admitsource
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 17 1.2.V02 - Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt / Séjour avant l’admission / Luogo di soggiorno prima dell’ammissione
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats18Admittype
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 18 1.2.V03 - Eintrittsart / Mode d’admission / Genere di ricovero
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Beschreibung der Umstände des Eintritts. Wie wurde der BFS Patient / die Patientin aufgenommen?

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats29Dischargeencounter
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 29 1.5.V04 - Behandlung nach Austritt / Prise en charge après la sortie / Trattamento dopo l’uscita
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Behandlung, Pflege, Rehabilitation nach dem Spitalaufenthalt. Es geht darum, den Behandlungserfolg resp. den Abhängigkeitsgrad bei Austritt anzugeben. Nur die am besten zutreffende Kategorie auswählen.

codeSystems.name: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
codeSystems.title: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter. In Switzerland the primary care physician is added to the extensible base ValueSet.

codeSystems.name: DesignationsVS
codeSystems.title: CH IG Designations
codeSystems.description: Example value set including all codes from the designations code system.

codeSystems.name: SctVS
codeSystems.title: CH IG SNOMED CT
codeSystems.description: Example value set including SNOMED CT codes from the international and the Swiss edition.

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.title: ContactPointSystem
codeSystems.description: Telecommunications form for contact point.

codeSystems.name: ContactPointUse
codeSystems.title: ContactPointUse
codeSystems.description: Use of contact point.

codeSystems.name: DiagnosisRole
codeSystems.title: DiagnosisRole
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

codeSystems.name: Diet
codeSystems.title: Diet
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationStatus
codeSystems.title: EncounterLocationStatus
codeSystems.description: The status of the location.

codeSystems.name: EncounterReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: Encounter Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

codeSystems.name: SpecialArrangements
codeSystems.title: Special arrangements
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

codeSystems.name: SpecialCourtesy
codeSystems.title: Special courtesy
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

codeSystems.name: EncounterStatus
codeSystems.title: EncounterStatus
codeSystems.description: Current state of the encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterType
codeSystems.title: Encounter type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

codeSystems.name: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.title: IdentifierType
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LocationType
codeSystems.title: Location type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

codeSystems.name: ServiceType
codeSystems.title: Service type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

codeSystems.name: v2.0360.2.7
codeSystems.title: v2 table 0360, Version 2.7
codeSystems.description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0360 ver 2.9 ( Degree/License/Certificate)

codeSystems.description: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)
